message:
Command `python - << 'PY'
from pathlib import Path
p=Path('/workspace/flask/src/flask/blueprints.py')
new=p.read_text()
ins='''        if not name:\n            raise ValueError("'name' must not be empty.")\n\n'''
old=new.replace(ins,'')
import difflib
print('\n'.join(difflib.unified_diff(old.splitlines(), new.splitlines(), fromfile='a/blueprints.py', tofile='b/blueprints.py')))
PY` executed with exit code 0.

+++ b/blueprints.py

             raise ValueError("'name' may not contain a dot '.' character.")

extras.command:
python - << 'PY'
from pathlib import Path
p=Path('/workspace/flask/src/flask/blueprints.py')
new=p.read_text()
ins='''        if not name:\n            raise ValueError("'name' must not be empty.")\n\n'''
old=new.replace(ins,'')
import difflib
print('\n'.join(difflib.unified_diff(old.splitlines(), new.splitlines(), fromfile='a/blueprints.py', tofile='b/blueprints.py')))
PY
